page.title: 03WORKERS IN GORDON SCHOOL1985
page.content: We have a lot of workers in Gordon school.Here they are. Cleaners,Teachers,Computer experts P.E. teacher,specialists teachers, Sewing teachers,Electrician,Joiners. The cleaners have a very hard job because they have to hoover&tidy every night . The electrician & the joiner both sort things or we would not have light or heating.The post man &the dustbinman are very different in ways. One brings things and the other takes things away .Teachers teach you. Our auxilury does a lot for Gordon Primary school like typing letters and takes phone calls.Pupils do jobs as well. They sometimes help the teachers .We have a job list which changes weekly.
